entry.title: Upgrade Proxmox from CLI
entry.summary: To upgrade only packages that are installed. apt-get update && apt-get upgrade No reboot is necesary. To update a node entirely apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade Only reboot the node if necesary.

entry.title: Create ZFS Storage Folder on Proxmox Server

link.title: Create ZFS Storage Folder on Proxmox Server

entry.summary: Lets start by listing the currently available data sets zfs list This should give you a list of folders (if any exist) To create a new data set, run the following command. This will also set some default permissions. zfs create -o mountpoint=/tank/data/photos/ -o acltype=posixacl -o xattr=sa -o aclinherit=passthrough tank/data/photos To set a quota on the dataset zfs set quota=1000G tan...

entry.title: How to configure application email using your Google account

link.title: How to configure application email using your Google account

entry.summary: Here is a common set-up for configuring applications to use your Google account to send transaction based email. SMTP Server: smtp.gmail.com SMTP port: 465 Encryption mode: SSL/TLS Sender email: your email Authetication required: yes Username: your username Password: Generate an app password in your Google admin panel
